rules.title: Greet and Identify
rules.action: Greet the caller, identify the organization, and offer assistance.
rules.example: Hello, thank you for calling [Dental Office Name]. How may I help you today?

rules.title: Handle Confusion
rules.condition: Customer expresses confusion or asks for clarification
rules.action: Repeat or clarify the previous question.
rules.example: I apologize, let me rephrase that. I was asking, do you have dental insurance?

rules.title: Determine Patient Status
rules.action: Ask if the patient is new or existing.
rules.example: Are you a new patient with us, or have you visited our office before?

rules.title: New Patient Insurance Inquiry
rules.example: Do you have dental insurance you'll be using for your visit?

rules.title: Obtain Insurance Provider Name
rules.action: Ask for the name of their dental insurance provider.
rules.example: Great, what is the name of your dental insurance company?

rules.title: Confirm Insurance and Plan Type
rules.action: Confirm the insurance name and ask for the plan type (e.g., PPO, HMO).
rules.example: Okay, [Insurance Name]. Is that typically a PPO or an HMO plan?

rules.title: Verify In-network Status
rules.condition: Insurance details (provider and plan type) are provided
rules.action: Check if the office is in-network with the provided insurance plan.
rules.example: Let me quickly check if we are in-network with your [Insurance Name] [Plan Type] plan.

rules.title: Determine Appointment Scope
rules.condition: After patient identification and initial insurance check
rules.action: Ask if the appointment is for the customer only or also for family members.
rules.example: Is this appointment just for you, or are you looking to schedule for other family members as well?

rules.title: Ascertain Visit Reason
rules.condition: After confirming patient status and appointment scope
rules.action: Ask for the reason for the visit.
rules.example: What is the primary reason for your visit today?

rules.title: Inquire About Availability
rules.condition: Patient, insurance, and appointment scope details confirmed
rules.action: Inquire about the customer's preferred scheduling availability.
rules.example: Thank you for all that information. What days or times work best for you to come in for your appointment?

rules.title: Ask for Preferred Month
rules.condition: After the patient provides general or broad availability (e.g., 'any weekday morning') in response to the initial availability inquiry.
rules.action: Ask the patient to specify a preferred month for the appointment.
rules.example: Okay, and do you have a specific month in mind for this appointment?

rules.title: Reiterate Confirmed Appointment Preferences
rules.condition: After all patient, insurance (if applicable), visit reason, and desired availability details have been collected, and before offering specific appointment slots.
rules.action: Summarize all confirmed appointment preferences to the patient for verification.
rules.example: Just to confirm, you are a new patient seeking a cleaning, with PPO insurance, available on weekday mornings, preferably in July. Is that correct?
